definitions.text:
1. Foulness; dirtiness; filthiness. Be not troublesome to thyself or to others by uncleanness
2. Want of ritual or ceremonial purity. Leviticus 15:3.
3. Moral impurity; defilement by sin; sinfulness. I will save you from all your uncleanness Ezekiel 36:17.
4. Lewdness; incontinence. Colossians 3:5. 2 Peter 2:10.
